name: WAKFU - Anathar Pack
detailed_description:
Be ready to face the World of Twelve with exclusive and powerful items! Leading Rushu's armies, Anathar is considered one of the most powerful and dangerous Shushus who came from the Shukrute into the World of Twelve. He can copy the powers of anyone he's touched and keep items in his belly. For years, he was kept by the Justice family who swore to protect the world from the Shushus.

*Be careful, this DLC pack can be activated only once per player account in WAKFU.

The Anathar Pack includes:

- 90 days of Aventure Booster
Reach your objectives faster, access Mount Zinit and the entire WAKFU universe! With the 90-Day Adventure Booster, increase your chances of obtaining new items, your pets will no longer hunger, all transports will be free, and much more

- 2 powerful sidekicks : The Flame and Cloud Knights
* Radiating extreme heat from the Fire element, this first Tormenting Knight is burning of impatience to join you! He is counting on you to whip his fighting skills into shape by giving him a second element of your choice, leaving you in control of the tactical side and to him the heat of the moment!
* The Cloud Knight is like a breath of fresh air in your combats! Don't be fooled by his calm exterior: Anyone who mistakes him for being light and fluffy will soon feel the wrath of his stormy temperament...

- The Phoenix Pet
This powerful gold pet gives you +60 HP and +30% Damage at level 50.

- The Gobball War Chief and its Harness

- The Vampyre Costume

- The King Kong Super Emote
Climb on your totem and show your apehood

- Change Class potion LVL 1 to 200

- The Shushu Bedroom set

- a Super Growth Kibble

- The White Sadida Bag

- Steam Exclusive decoration
Before the Eliacube, there was...


HOW TO REDEEM:
To get all the content of your Anathar Pack once you’ve purchased it with your Steam Wallet:
Enter your 15 characters code on the WAKFU website: www.wakfu.com
Once you have entered your code, The code remains valid until you choose your server.
Then, you just have to confirm at the bottom of the redeem page.
Your Ogrines will be automatically credited to your account, the Booster days to your server and you can collect all yours items directly ingame in the Gift Interface.

short_description: The Anathar Pack includes 90 days of Booster Packs, 2 powerful sidekicks : The Flame and Cloud Knights, the Phoenix Pet, the Gobball War Chief and its Harness, the Vampyre Costume, the King Kong Super Emote, Change Class potion LVL 1 to 200, she Shushu Bedroom set, a Super Growth Kibble, the White Sadida Bag and a Steam-Exclusive decoration.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese-Brazil, Italian, Thai

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher
  • Processor: Pentium IV 2.8 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 4Ti or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 1.3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 6 series or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 1.3

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac 10.6
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac 10.7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
